summary.content: I was going to write something up about the problem I have with Lockergnome regressing back to table-based layouts recently, but the I came across this, and although I would have written something completely different, this still sums it all up quite nicely.

content.source: I was going to write something up about the problem I have with Lockergnome regressing back to table-based layouts recently, but the I came across [this]({{% wayback "http://photomatt.net/archives/2004/03/10/code-is-food/" %}}), and although I would have written something completely different, this still sums it all up quite nicely.
